card_name: RB01 The Dwarf in the Flask
rules_text:
[i]Alchemize[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell, if mana from a nonland source was spent to cast it, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

flavor_text: [i]“In that case you're no different from me, trapped inside this stuffy flask...”[/i]
